1.title: Hunted Humans

episode of.title: Naked and Afraid XL: Uncensored All-Stars (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: With insider facts and bonus footage - Thirteen Naked and Afraid all-stars attempt to survive 40 days and 40 nights in Africa's sun-scorched Selati Basin. When one group finds meat, hungry hyenas stalk their camp.

2.title: Africa Strikes First

episode of.title: Naked and Afraid XL: Uncensored All-Stars (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: With insider facts and bonus footage - The survivalists hunt and scavenge for impala during the day only to have the scent of fresh meat draw the big cats to their bomas at night.

3.title: Africa Strikes Twice

episode of.title: Naked and Afraid XL: Uncensored All-Stars (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: With insider facts and bonus footage - Desperate for food, Duck hunts alone at night. Former swamp partners Jeremy and Melanie reunite when their teams merge.

4.title: To Hail and Back

episode of.title: Naked and Afraid XL: Uncensored All-Stars (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: With insider facts and bonus footage - Rain and hail pelt the remaining survivalists, putting them at risk for severe hypothermia. Then, a successful hunt backfires, leaving two survivalists in danger of tapping out.

9.title: Fight to the Finish

episode of.title: Naked and Afraid XL: Uncensored All-Stars (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: With insider facts - In an epic two-hour event, the group gets a much-needed victory when the hunters score a kill. To finish the challenge, the survivalists must complete a brutal extraction.

11.title: Lions at the Gate

11.plot: With insider facts and bonus footage - 12 Naked and Afraid veterans begin their 40-day and 40-night challenge in the drought-stricken bush of South Africa, where water is scarce and the lions don't like to share.

7.title: Left Behind

episode of.title: Naked and Afraid XL: Uncensored All-Stars (TV Series 2015– )
